110101.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at defending. Can block 2 enemies at the same time and increase Max HP by <color=#63b4c3>10%</color>.
110101.maniaIntensifyText: All allied Sinners on the field will gain an Attack increase equal to <color=#63b4c3>0.5%</color> of their Shield Value.

110102.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at defending. Can block 2 enemies at the same time. If the Sinner moves, the lion head [Seven Star] will be left in the original grid. [Seven Star] can only appear once in 20 seconds. It has 100% of OwO's Max HP, Defense, and Magic Resistance, but is unable to attack. It can block 2 enemies and is immune to control effects. It will disappear after it's been attacked 6 times. Only one [Seven Star] can exist on the battlefield.
110102.maniaIntensifyText: When OwO uses [Star of Fortune], the lion head [Seven Star] will use the same skill simultaneously. The buff is not stackable.

110103.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at defending. Blocks 2 enemies at the same time. When Rahu's HP is above 30%, she gains a 10% increase in Physical Damage; When it's below 30%, she gains a 10% damage reduction.
110103.maniaIntensifyText: Rahu immediately triggers [Counterblow] once when her weapon form switches to [Guardian Blade].

110104.initialAttribute: A Sinner highly contaminated by the DisSea who can block 2 enemies at the same time. Gains <color=#63b4c3>2</color> M-Value each time damage is taken, up to <color=#63b4c3>10</color> M-Value per second. Enters [Corruption State] when M-Value reaches <color=#63b4c3>60</color>, gaining a <color=#63b4c3>15%</color> HP boost while consuming <color=#63b4c3>4</color> M-Value per second. Leaves [Corruption State] when M-Value reaches <color=#63b4c3>0</color>.

110105.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at defending. Can block 2 enemies at the same time. At the start of the battle, Moore prioritizes granting [Matrixes] to allied Sinners on both sides. If there are fewer than two allied Sinners by her side, Moore gains the [Matrix] herself.

110201.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at Physical Output. Deals <color=#63b4c3>5%</color> more Damage, and another <color=#63b4c3>5%</color> more for enemies with broken Cores.
110201.maniaIntensifyText: Deals <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more Damage, and another <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more for enemies with broken Cores.

110202.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at Physical Output. Deals <color=#63b4c3>5%</color> more Damage, and another <color=#63b4c3>5%</color> more for enemies with broken Cores.

110204.maniaIntensifyText: Deals <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more Damage, and another <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more for enemies with broken Cores.

110205.maniaIntensifyText: Deals <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more Damage, and another <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more for enemies with broken Cores.

110206.initialAttribute: A Sinner highly contaminated by the DisSea. She gains <color=#63b4c3>3</color> M-value whenever any unit dies on the field, up to <color=#63b4c3>15</color> M-value per second. When an allied Sinner dies, she gains <color=#63b4c3>60</color> M-value additionally. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#63b4c3>3</color> times per battle. When her M-value reaches <color=#63b4c3>60</color>, she enters [Corruption State], gaining an <color=#63b4c3>8%</color> Attack bonus while consuming <color=#63b4c3>4</color> M-value per second. [Corruption State] ends when her M-value reaches <color=#63b4c3>0</color>.
110206.maniaIntensifyText: Deals <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more Damage, and another <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> more for enemies with broken Cores.

110301.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at breaking Cores. Can deal multiple Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.
110301.maniaIntensifyText: Upon breaking enemies' cores, CRIT Rate is increased by <color=#63b4c3>50%</color> for <color=#63b4c3>10</color> seconds. This effect cannot be stacked by breaking enemies' cores multiple times.

110302.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at stealth assaults. Can deal Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.
110302.maniaIntensifyText: Automatically enters [Shadow Stealth] once at the start of a battle.

110303.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at Magic Damage whose Ultimate deals Core Damage. Normal Attack is dealt first to enemies with [Fang] marks together with additional (Attack * <color=#63b4c3>40%</color>) <color=#c47d20>Magic Damage</color>.
110303.maniaIntensifyText: When an enemy with a [Fang] mark receives another [Fang] mark, the enemy suffers (Attack *<color=#63b4c3>200%</color>) <color=#c47d20>Magic Damage</color> from Serpent.

110304.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at breaking Cores. Deals Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.
110304.maniaIntensifyText: When no other Sinners are present within the cross area range, Adela gains a <color=#63b4c3>15%</color> CRIT Rate increase.

Lasts until the end of the battle.

112203.maniaIntensifyText: For each [Life Loss] state carried by the enemy, Pepper gains a <color=#63b4c3>6%</color> Damage increase against them.

112301.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at stealth assaults from behind. Can deal Core Damage when casting an Ultimate. Does not gain Energy over time, but will instead recover 1 point of Energy per Normal Attack.
112301.maniaIntensifyText: Ultimate resets charge after the Core is broken.

112302.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at breaking Cores. Deals Core Damage when casting an Ultimate. Does not gain Energy over time, but will instead recover 1 point of Energy per Normal Attack.
112302.maniaIntensifyText: Core Damage dealt by Ultimate is increased by <color=#63b4c3>1</color> point.

112401.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at Long-Distance Output. Can deal Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.

112402.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at Physical Output. Deals <color=#63b4c3>5%</color> more Damage, and another <color=#63b4c3>5%</color> more for enemies with broken Cores.

112501.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at Magic Output. Freezes an enemy for <color=#63b4c3>2</color> seconds upon hitting them using [Ice Crystal] <color=#63b4c3>5</color> times. This effect can trigger on the same enemy once every <color=#63b4c3>15</color> seconds.
112501.maniaIntensifyText: Upon freezing a target, Attack is increased by <color=#63b4c3>15%</color> for <color=#63b4c3>10</color> seconds.

112502.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at Magic Output. Reduces targets' Magic Resistance by <color=#63b4c3>5%</color> with each mark of [Marcato] for <color=#63b4c3>10</color> seconds, up to <color=#63b4c3>6</color> stacks.

112601.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at supporting allies. Increases Energy Recovery Speed by <color=#63b4c3>10%</color>.

112602.initialAttribute: A Sinner adept at disturbing enemies. Uses [Consonance] to reduce enemies' Movement Speed by <color=#63b4c3>10%</color> for <color=#63b4c3>4</color> seconds.
112602.maniaIntensifyText: Energy Recovery Speed is increased by <color=#63b4c3>15%</color>.
